alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 11:25AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches through this evening, with locally higher amounts in heavier snow bands. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains, Oglala Lakota County and the Hermosa Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills
